title: Using spatial cues to improve videoconferencing
proctitle: CHI '92: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

references.text: Buxton, W. and Sellen, A. (1991). Interfaces for multiparty videoconferencing. Unpublished paper. Dynamic Graphics Project, Dept. of Computer Science, University of Toronto: Toronto, Canada.
Fields, C.I. (1983). Virtual space teleconference system. United States Patent 4,400,724, August 23, 1983.
Sellen, AJ. (1992). Speech patterns in video-mediated conversations. In these proceedings.
